text: [Music]
[Applause]
[Music]
hello I'm Mary a technical customer
service agent here at the AWS office in
San Jose Costa Rica today I'm going to
show you how to recover your password to
regain access to your AWS account let's
get
started first you must make sure that
you have one of the following your AWS
account root user email address this is
the email address that you use to create
the account your AWS identity and access
management username your account
administrator sets the username and
password for IM am users your AWS
account number in order to reset your
root user password let's go through
these steps first use your AWS account
email address to begin signing into the
AWS Management console as the root
user then choose next now select forgot
your
password Here answer the capture text
and choose send
email finally check the email that is
associated with your AWS account for a
message from Amazon web services the
email will come from an address ending
in at Amazon.com or at aws.amazon.com
if you locate it then follow the
directions in the email if you don't see
the email in your account check your
spam
folder if you sign in as an IM am user
then contact your account administrator
to get assistance to recover your AWS
password so now you know how to recover
your password to regain access to your
AWS account thanks for watching and
happy cloud computing from all of us
here at
[Music]
[Applause]
[Music]
AWS
[Music]
